definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Engage and exhale to do an Attitude Press in non-traditional Pilates.
sentences.chinese: 參與和呼氣做非傳統普拉提一種態度出版社。

sentences.english: I start my day with Pilates breathing techniques that seem to be most beneficial for me.
sentences.chinese: 我以普拉提呼吸法開始每一天，這對我十分有益。

sentences.english: This is daily Pilates classes and one meal a month .
sentences.chinese: 這就是練普拉提和每月只吃1頓飯的結果。

sentences.english: After that, it is pilates meant for the abdominals and lower back muscles.
sentences.chinese: 之後，它的意思是普拉提的腹部和腰部肌肉。

sentences.english: Stott Pilates uses the neutral spine position in exercise routines.
sentences.chinese: 斯托特普拉提練習套路中使用中立的立場脊柱。

sentences.english: Pilates balls can be used to help strengthen the chest in adaptive Pilates.
sentences.chinese: 普拉提球可以用來幫助加強胸部在自適應普拉提。

sentences.english: Pilates balls can be used to help strengthen the chest in adaptive Pilates.
sentences.chinese: 普拉提球可以用來幫助加強胸部在自適應普拉提。

sentences.english: Cat pounces in naughty Pilates build strength in the arms and balance other postures.
sentences.chinese: 淘氣的貓突襲中普拉提建立在軍備力量和平衡等姿勢。

sentences.english: Well, I went into labor at the Pilates gym.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一個普拉提斯健身房分娩的。

sentences.english: Pilates and yoga have also been universally accepted as forms of stress relief exercise.
sentences.chinese: 普拉提和瑜伽也已成爲人們普遍接受的減壓鍛鍊方式。

sentences.english: In Winsor Pilates you make circles with an elevated leg to sculpt your buns and thighs.
sentences.chinese: 在溫莎普拉提你與提升的腿各界雕塑你的饅頭和大腿。

sentences.english: Victims of injury or disease can use adaptive Pilates to rehabilitate.
sentences.chinese: 受傷或疾病的受害者可以恢復使用自適應普拉提。

sentences.english: The spine stretch forward in Pilates stretches the lower back and hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 在普拉提向前延伸脊柱伸展下背部和腿筋。

sentences.english: Start beginner Pilates exercises by practicing breathing techniques.
sentences.chinese: 初學者開始練普拉提練習呼吸技巧。

sentences.english: Swing one leg freely in Pilates when engaging the obliques.
sentences.chinese: 普拉提一條腿擺動自如時搞斜肌。
